name: Over My Dead Pixel
description: Over My Dead Pixel is a top down shooter where you command antivirus software to defend your computer from malware. Beware, firing your weapons will shrink your playspace. Maneuver deftly to avoid the enemies and the walls, as one single hit means restarting.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Quad core i5 Memory: 2 GB RAM Storage: 200 MB available space
